_comment: Production input template for ThresholdProof circuit
_description: This template shows the required structure for circuit inputs. All values should be strings for compatibility with snarkjs.

_constraints.tags: Array of 10 integers representing tag IDs (0-255). Unused slots should be 0.
_constraints.targetTag: String representation of the target tag ID to count (0-255)
_constraints.threshold: String representation of minimum required count (0-10)
